game.title: The Lost City
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact in the lost city of Eldarath.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a lost city deep in the forest, filled with ancient artifacts and treasures. The city is said to be hidden behind a waterfall, and the only way to access it is by solving a series of puzzles and riddles.

task.objective: Solve the riddle of the ancient ones.
task.description: Find the stone pedestal in the forest and decipher the riddle etched into it. The answer will reveal the location of the next clue.
task.location: Forest, near the old oak tree

task.description: Follow the stream that flows from the forest into the nearby cave. Inside, you'll find a chest containing the crystal key. Use it to unlock the door behind the waterfall.

task.objective: Explore the lost city and retrieve the artifact.
task.description: Enter the lost city through the door behind the waterfall. Navigate the ancient ruins and find the chamber containing the artifact. Be careful, as the city is said to be trapped with deadly puzzles and guarded by fearsome creatures.
